评论概述: Nice jacket but has zipper in front
评论详情: The product title is "Medieval Renaissance Gothic Frock Coat Steampunk Victorian Jacket". Unfortunately zippers, like the one going all the way up the front of this coat, are not very medieval. It's very difficult to see in the photos but the zipper really takes away from the look and modernizes something that is potentially very vintage. Ultimately I returned this item.
Use this as my costume for Halloween and got a lot of compliments. The material is not cheap looking at all. Great value for the money.

评论概述: Not really made for plus size
评论详情: This product runs very small. Definitely not true to size. It's made very well, love all the details. Not made for plus size or anyone who is very busty.

Normally I have to size up. Especially because of my arms. Oddly I had to size down so instead of a large or xl I ended up with a medium. I still have room, but it’s comfortable, and the arms fit well, it’s a little costumy for my normal costume, but this year we will be outside , so I need a coat, the price was right on this one.
I ended up buying 1 size down and it fits exactly as it should! I love this jacket!

Runs super large. Isn’t the best quality. It has a ton of stretch. I opt for a large when I want to be comfy and didn’t get to use this at all-I ordered a medium to replace the large and it was too big. Had to return both

评论概述: Fabulous, thick velvet, best purchase yet
评论详情: Quality material no skimping here well-made buy one size up if you need room for a thicker clothing underneath otherwise fits perfect
